casebody.data:
Barker Place, as executor, &c., respondent, v. Jedediah K. Hayward, appellant. Decided June 16, 1884. Appeal from an order denying a motion that the costs herein be paid by the plaintiff individually. J. K. Hayward, for appellant; Charles F. Wells, for respondent.

Before Truax and Ingraham, JJ.

Memorandum per Curiam.—Order affirmed, with costs.
